laws.description: This section commonly relates to identity theft involving misuse of personal information.
This section is commonly associated with online cheating and fraud through digital means.
This section relates to unwelcome physical or verbal conduct of a sexual nature.
This section deals with words or gestures intended to insult the modesty of a woman.
This section commonly relates to cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property.
This section defines theft involving dishonest taking of movable property.
These guidelines outline student rights and grievance redressal mechanisms in educational institutions.
